title: 怎么用命令方块命令删除漏斗里的物品
author: COCOMAX
txt_content: 如题，就这个，我做东西要用

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
replaceitem block x y z slot.container.0 air
replaceitem block x y z slot.container.1 air
replaceitem block x y z slot.container.2 air
replaceitem block x y z slot.container.3 air
replaceitem block x y z slot.container.4 air

把xyz换为方块的坐标

replies.author: WekyJay
replies.txt_content: 命令方块好像不能删除里面的东西，但是删除这个方块还是可以！

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
1.8：/setblock x y z minecraft:hopper 0 replace
1.7：先/setblock x y z 11
然后/setblock x y z 154

replies.author: COCOMAX
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-9-10 11:59
1.8：/setblock x y z minecraft:hopper 0 replace
1.7：先/setblock x y z 11
然后/setblock x y z 154 ...
但是我要规定留下一定的东西，比如我只删掉里面的128课钻石

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
COCOMAX 发表于 2015-9-10 21:20
但是我要规定留下一定的东西，比如我只删掉里面的128课钻石
这个做不到

replaceite ...
